webcast.translation[0].definitions[0].de: an event such as a musical performance which you can listen to or watch on the Internet
webcast.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to broadcast an event on the Internet, at the time the event happens
webcast.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Various local news sites plan to webcast each of the mayoral debates.
webcast.translation[2].definitions[0].de: an event that is broadcast on the Internet as it is happening
webcast.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: There will be a live webcast of the total solar eclipse.
webcast.translation[3].definitions[0].de: to broadcast an event on the Internet, at the time the event is happening
webcast.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: Various local news sites plan to webcast each of the mayoral debates.
